title: Confederate Flag Supporters In Georgia Indicted On Terrorism Charges
text:
Confederate Flag Supporters In Georgia Indicted On Terrorism Charges 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
On Monday, 15 supporters of the Confederate battle flag were indicted on terrorism charges in Douglas County, a suburb of Atlanta.The 15 acc...
